did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.unittitle: Virginia Counties Clipping Files - Western Region , 1920-1991
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, shelf 15A, level 1.
did.abstract: Contains materials related to the following Southwest Virginia counties: Pulaski, Floyd, Giles, Grayson, Allegheny, Augusta, Carroll, and Montgomery. The complete finding aid is available.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Virginia Counties Clipping Files -Western Region, Appalachian Collection, McConnell Library, Radford University, Radford, VA. Virginia Counties Clipping Files - Western Region , Accession # AC 014, University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This material was collected in McConnell Library clipping files during the 1970s and 1980s.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Brandon Edwards. Finding aid by Brandon Edwards and Gene Hyde, February 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Materials in this collection were gathered from news sources, local organizations, county publications, and other materials collected in file cabinets in McConnell Library during the 1970s and 80s. Topically, this collection covers education, schools, local history, businesses, public health, government, local clubs and organizations, churches, the public library, recreation, and other topics related to the Southwestern Counties.

blockquote.p: Box 3: Floyd, Giles, and Grayson Counties
Box 4: Alleghany, Augusta, and Carroll Counties
